name: Pandemic
description:
We wanted to make a project that could be educational and fun at the same time. Our goal was to make a game that could teach people about the difficult decision-making process during a virus outbreak. Our initial though was to create a game that was about vaccines but we realized it was a challenging goal for the time we had. Instead we pivoted a bit and still, conveyed out true message that learning can be fun.

While making this we learned a lot and had a lot of fun. Everything in the game was created by us in the last 24 including all of the graphics. We are proud of what we accomplished during HackMit 2019.

Creators: Greg Peterson and Charity Midenyo
